title: LESCO guard suspended, arrested after assault on elderly woman
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 2 (APP):The Power Division has taken strict action against Lahore Electric Supply Company (LESCO) guard, following a disturbing incident in Sheikhupura where he manhandled an elderly woman on June 30.
According to an official spokesperson, the guard was immediately suspended and an FIR was also registered against him. He is currently in police custody.
“This kind of behavior — breaking the law and humiliating citizens — will not be tolerated under any circumstances,” the spokesperson said, emphasizing that electricity consumers deserve the highest respect.
The Power Division has also launched departmental proceedings to terminate the guard’s employment and has ordered a full inquiry to be completed within three days.
In response to the incident, all power distribution companies (DISCOs) have been directed to take immediate preventive measures and issue clear instructions to their offices to ensure public dealing is handled with dignity and respect.
“We extend our sincere apologies to the elderly woman and other consumers affected by this unacceptable act,” the spokesperson added.
